member.name: D3D12_INPUT_LAYOUT_DESC
member.summary: Describes the input-buffer data for the input-assembler stage.

member.name: D3D12_INPUT_LAYOUT_DESC.pInputElementDescs
member.summary: An array of structures that describe the data types of the input-assembler stage.

member.name: D3D12_INPUT_LAYOUT_DESC.NumElements
member.summary: The number of input-data types in the array of input elements that the pInputElementDescs member points to.
